name: Mortu-Macaab

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 24%.

skills.name: Stigmata
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +15%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Falling from Grace
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Places a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns on targets under [Heal Reduction] debuffs. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns against targets not under [Heal Reduction] debuffs.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Fiery Rage
skills.raw_description: Has a 10% chance to unlock a secret skill, Peril, for 1 turn. Also has a 20% chance to fill this Champion's Turn Meter by 25% when attacked.

skills.name: Peril
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Will ignore [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs as well as DEF. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [HP]
